a.detail: A sulphurous odor fills the corridor
a.summary: A sulphurous odor fills the corridor

c.detail: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the corridor
c.summary: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the corridor

e.detail: A 15-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor
e.summary: A 15-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

details.floor: Hewn Stone (DC 10 to charge or run) (shallow water, difficult terrain)
details.history: The dungeon was created by a beholder as a shrine. Its creator was destroyed by a terrible discovery, and the dungeon has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.

detail.room_features: A magical mirror on the east wall answers questions with lies and falsehoods, and someone has scrawled "Run away!" on the north wall

east.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
Wooden Portcullis (lift DC 20, DC 15 to break; 30 hp)

north.desc: Wooden Portcullis (lift DC 20, DC 15 to break; 30 hp)

south.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp) (magically reinforced, disadvantage to break)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 20 to find) Unlocked Simple Wooden Chest (10 hp)

48000 gp, 30000 pp, a platinum pendant inlaid with a filigree of orichalcum (7500 gp), a platinum rapier engraved with mythical imagery (7500 gp), an amber puzzle box inlaid with ornate orichalcum scrollwork (7500 gp), an ornate porcelain tile adorned with platinum and a castle in relief (7500 gp), Spell Scroll (Tsunami) (very rare, dmg 200), Horseshoes of a Zephyr (very rare, dmg 175), Portable Hole (rare, dmg 185), Potion of Flying (very rare, dmg 187), 2 x Potion of Speed (very rare, dmg 188)
monster: 9 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 9 x Worg (cr 1/2, mm 341); deadly, 1800 xp
Treasure: 49000 gp, 29000 pp, a silk tapestry embroidered with platinum (7500 gp), Crystal Ball (very rare, dmg 159), Rod of Security (very rare, dmg 197)
detail.room_features: The south and west walls have been engraved with strange symbols, and a rusted sword lies in the north side of the room

contents.summary: 9 x Hobgoblin and 9 x Worg, Hidden Treasure

settings.name: The Dread Hive of Kas the Betrayer

wandering_monsters.1: Tanarukk (cr 5, motm 240, vgm 186) and 6 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246); hard, 2400 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.2: Hobgoblin Devastator (cr 4, motm 153, vgm 161) and 4 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); easy, 1500 xp, wandering senselessly
wandering_monsters.3: Fomorian (cr 8, mm 136) and 7 x Boggle (cr 1/8, motm 65, vgm 128); hard, 4075 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.4: Ogre Battering Ram (cr 4, motm 200, mtf 220) and 3 x Ogre (cr 2, mm 237); hard, 2450 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.5: Fire Giant (cr 9, mm 154); hard, 5000 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.6: Ogre Bolt Launcher (cr 2, motm 200, mtf 220) and 5 x Ogre (cr 2, mm 237); hard, 2700 xp, hunting for food
